section.title: RelevanceRelation relation type
section.para: Represents the fact that two or more senses (typically - but not necessarily - belonging to two different entries) are relevant to each other, in ways other than opposition and similarity. This relation type is suitable for connecting words (more accurately: senses of words) which are connected to one another in experience (= one encounters them together) but are not any kind of "nyms", eg. money, pay, bill, charge...

listitem.para: Sense (two or more, all in the same LexicographicResource)
